traits.title: impl<RW: AsyncRead + AsyncWrite> AsyncBufRead for BufStream<RW>

methods.code: fn poll_fill_buf( self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>) -> Poll<Result<&[u8]>>
methods.text: Attempts to return the contents of the internal buffer, filling it with more data from the inner reader if it is empty.

methods.code: fn consume(self: Pin<&mut Self>, amt: usize)
methods.text: Tells this buffer that amt bytes have been consumed from the buffer, so they should no longer be returned in calls to poll_read.

traits.title: impl<RW: AsyncRead + AsyncWrite> AsyncRead for BufStream<RW>

methods.code: fn poll_read( self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>, buf: &mut ReadBuf<'_>) -> Poll<Result<()>>
methods.text: Attempts to read from the AsyncRead into buf.

methods.code: fn start_seek(self: Pin<&mut Self>, position: SeekFrom) -> Result<()>
methods.text: Attempts to seek to an offset, in bytes, in a stream.

methods.code: fn poll_complete( self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>) -> Poll<Result<u64>>
methods.text: Waits for a seek operation to complete.

traits.title: impl<RW: AsyncRead + AsyncWrite> AsyncWrite for BufStream<RW>

methods.code: fn poll_write( self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>, buf: &[u8]) -> Poll<Result<usize>>
methods.text: Attempt to write bytes from buf into the object.

methods.code: fn poll_write_vectored( self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>, bufs: &[IoSlice<'_>]) -> Poll<Result<usize>>
methods.text: Like poll_write, except that it writes from a slice of buffers.
Determines if this writer has an efficient poll_write_vectored implementation.

methods.code: fn poll_flush(self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>) -> Poll<Result<()>>
methods.text: Attempts to flush the object, ensuring that any buffered data reach their destination.

methods.code: fn poll_shutdown(self: Pin<&mut Self>, cx: &mut Context<'_>) -> Poll<Result<()>>
methods.text: Initiates or attempts to shut down this writer, returning success when the I/O connection has completely shut down.
